brief.content-text:
Diagram 2, Activity

The diagram depicts an activity in which you must identify which part of the network, wired, wireless, or both, is associated with each scenario.

Scenarios
One. Improperly configured SSID.
Two. Improperly configured addressing.
Three. Inability to ping from S T A to wired host.
Four. Disconnected Ethernet port on AP.
Five. Improperly configured channel.
Six. Wrong cable type used to connect AP.
Seven. Defective cable used to connect AP.
Eight. Improperly configured Wireless authentication.
Nine. Wrong wireless mode.
